mapper.insert: insert into member (m_id, m_password, m_password_con, m_name, m_gender, m_phone, m_address, m_nickname, m_introduction, m_activity_area, m_created_date) values (#{m_id}, #{m_password}, #{m_password_con}, #{m_name}, #{m_gender}, #{m_phone}, #{m_address}, #{m_nickname}, #{m_introduction}, #{m_activity_area}, #{m_created_date})
mapper.select: select * from member where m_id = #{m_id} and m_password = #{m_password}
